original_title: Bids open next month to restructure SriLankan
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Aviation said bids will be opened next month in relation to the restructuring of SriLankan Airlines.
The Ministry said those submitting bids have requested time to submit the bids.
The Cabinet of Ministers had approved the restructuring of SriLankan Airlines.
The Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Aviation said discussions were held with the World Bank in this regard after the proposal was directed to the Treasury.
